entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize consumes CPU and memory that it never returns #67369
  • [API Proposal]: Enhance RequiresDynamicCode Attribute to apply to class #67368
  • Cannot deserialize an immutable collection #67361
  • Android test runner overwrites assemblies from multiple tests #67359
  • Invoking delegate with null argument not working as expected. #67354
  • GSS failures in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests on Ubuntu 22.04 #67353
  • CreateXHarnessAppleWorkItems task failed unexpectedly when building iOS arm64 AllSubsets_Mono #67349
  • CultureInfo slower on Linux: 300ms vs 13000ms #67347
    Future
  • x64 vs ARM64 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #67339
  • Add ability to stream large binary content to Utf8JsonWriter #67337
  • ConstructorConverter argument cache initialization invoking the wrong method #67333
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Writes to small args on macOS can (still) overwrite adjacent args #67331
  • Confusion regarding Volatile.Read guarantees, and example in the volatile docs #67330
  • Arm64: Forward memset/memcpy to CRT implementation #67326
  • [wasm] blazor_scenarios for perf are not working completely #67323
    7.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Tests failing on Windows 10 Arm64 with OS apparently doubling DPI of bitmaps/icons #67320
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for wasm/performance runs #67319
  • Poor interaction between loop recognition and GDV caused by early block reordering #67318
  • Cross-targeting to x64 on an arm64 machine with an upgraded arm64 runtime fails #67316

Closed

  • Test failure: JIT\\Directed\\StructABI\\structreturn\\structreturn.cmd #67355
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'lclNode->GetSsaNum() == SsaConfig::FIRST_SSA_NUM' during 'VN based copy prop' #67346
  • .NET 7 target, .NET 6 docs #63090
    7.0.0
  • .Net 6 breaks Ninject compatability (InvalidProgramException) #67351
  • Seemed the `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe` is not necessary for .NET 6 + #67196
    7.0.0
  • Annotate unsupported APIs in System.Security.* #50528
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator behaves oddly if context is generic #66880
    7.0.0
  • Unable to attach debugger to process using .NET 6 when Runtimeidentifier is set to x64 #67327
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator crashes if context is an inner class of a generic type #66881
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22057.7]MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit failed to launch with BadImageFormat exception #64255
  • JIT: Too narrow store for argument passed on stack on macOS ARM64 #67344
    7.0.0
  • Test failed at double initialization assert in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonTypeInfo.InitializePropCache() #60962
    7.0.0
  • JsonDocument.ParseValue throws exception when parsing Utf8JsonReader when the json has a comment #67004
  • A new way to modify JsonOptions #67097
  • The converter 'EnumConverter' is not compatible with the type 'System.Nullable`1[FooType]'. #67228
  • [QUIC] Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #32068
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Erroneous flow of inbound MsQuicStream ctor doesn't release safe handle #55814
    7.0.0
  • `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` failures on `coreclr windows x64 Debug` #67164
  • [NativeAOT] Are RdXmlFile properties transitive? #66085
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor tests to use existing, complex test classes #63667
    7.0.0
  • build no longer works in directories donating dash on Windows #67259

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable test45929 for win-arm64 #67363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable all StructABI tests in pri-0 #67362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert with --aot=llvmonly and -O=gsharedvt. #67357
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix a PAL filemapping test for macOS arm64 #67352
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Always commit X.509 chain before Finish #67350
    area-System.Security
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix Wrong exception for Open*Stream after connection is closed #67342
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Call SendResettableCompletionSource.CompleteException in AbortWrite #67341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix too wide constant stores to parameters on macOS #67336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` on x86 #67335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Minor refactoring in MarshallingAttributeInfoParser #67325
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Added the option to get the compiler version from Crossgen2 #67317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert "Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes (#66251)" #67360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tweak OSR debugging document #67366
  • Show the actual value of the X09VerifyStatusCode on error #67306
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • perf: wasm: Collect helix logs, and artifacts when the build fails #67248
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix SuperPMI implementation of `appendClassName` #67280
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable coredumps for fuzzers #67340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete key blob support on ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey #67264
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix Referencing Unsafe Package in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource #67322
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Fix failing CI after merging 63730 #67348
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable recently added analyzers (and fix some violations) #67292
    area-Meta
  • Add missing SUCCEEDED() within conditional #67321
    area-ILTools-coreclr, codeql
  • Fix failing debug assertion in JsonTypeInfo initialization #67334
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1689955 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run fuzzers on macOS arm64 #67297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Quote file path in rc file #67307
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Switch crossgen2 to use SHA256 for PDB hash #67305
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-manual pipeline #67312
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 and x86 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Suppressing RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute for Compiled Regex #67299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor JsonSerializer metadata reading infrastructure #67183
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Detect systemd when inside a container. #67288
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup fp registers assignments from arm64 path #65629
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration` #67174
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm 9.x, the 11.x support is stable … #67277
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Reflection.Emit cleanups #67170
    area-System.Reflection
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When updating workload manifest to a different feature band, uninstall the older manifest feature band #24628
    6.0.4xx
  • dotnet tool install fails on Ubuntu with prerelease versions that contain a + character #24623

Closed

  • Right behavior when query dotnet workload list (command in admin install location) while have VS installed workload #19549
    6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet run` gives `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` error at `TryGetTargetArchitecture` method #23004
    6.0.3xx
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with rollback files #23402
    6.0.3xx
  • Ship workloads out-of-band of the SDK #23370
    6.0.3xx
  • NETSDK1147 Change this error message to recommend a dotnet workload restore #23445
    6.0.3xx
  • SkipGetTargetFrameworkProperties is not honored for non direct csproj ProjectReference #22878
  • Report an error when using --skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24023
    6.0.3xx
  • Finish optional SDK workload composition #12901
    6.0.3xx
  • dotnet 6 CLI not working #23186
  • Question: $(TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName) is blank on .NET 6.0 and .NET 5.0 #23191
  • The build is failing with the following: #24080
  • 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '5.0.0' was not found #20116
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects #24093
  • `%(TargetingPack.PackageDirectory)` blank when installed via .msi? #23562
    Discussion
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe #24112
  • .NET 6.0 Can not publish with PublishReadyToRun on alpine-x64 without restore #22706
  • When installing workloads, hide manifest updates from customers #23446
    6.0.3xx
  • Workload advertising update timer should be separate for each feature band #23760
    6.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Support installing workload pack groups #24630

Merged

  • Add support to turn off signature verification for workload commands #24590
    Area-Workloads
  • Workload feature band fallback with rollback files #24545
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1691381 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Package Validation support for cases where PackageId is different than AssemblyName #24439
  • SDK integration via BundledNetCoreApp #24550
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpSourceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile is Flaky #60477
    17.3
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.UnitTests.DocumentChanges.DocumentChangesTests.DidCloseWithoutDidOpen_Errors is Flakey #60476
    17.3
  • Compiler CI test `EmitSequenceOfBinaryExpressions_06` failing #60472

Closed

  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler #60479
    17.3
  • csharpcodedefinitionwindow.codedefinitionwindowopensmetadataassource failing #60363
  • [Flaky integration tests] IDE version '17.2.32314.265' unexpectedly dismissed the light bulb. #60461
  • do not add async to a void method #60467
  • [Flaky integration tests] System.InvalidOperationException : Light bulb transitioned to non-complete state: CompletedWithoutData #60463
  • [Broken test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpGoToBase.GoToBaseFromMetadataAsSource #60386
  • An exception that occurs after.NET Core is compiled to a single file #60144
    Backlog
  • GenerateAssemblyInfo set to false disables EnablePreviewFeatures, then CA2252 #60454
  • An extra space will be inserted into `(` and `[` token for recursive pattern and list pattern #60160
    17.3
  • VS 2022 suggesting code breaking simplifications #60387

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60489
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify how we handle event change notifications in tagging #60488
    Area-IDE
  • Publish blame heap dumps for new integration tests #60487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints: look for methodkind.localfunction when checking method intent #60486
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Modify semanticTokens `isFinalized` logic #60484
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [17.0 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60483
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60482
    Area-Compilers
  • Use provider type name for CodeAction telemetry for code actions... #60480
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Document ROSLYN_TEST_USEDASSEMBLIES #60478
    Area-Compilers
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Zero fields before running field initializers in struct constructor with default `: this()` initializer #60471
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60470
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1676641 #60325
    auto-merge
  • Disable compiler test `EmitSequenceOfBinaryExpressions_06` in release scenario #60473
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Diagnostics: Fix conflicting diagnostics and general code cleanup #60468
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable CSharpGoToBase.GoToBaseFromMetadataAsSource #60458
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't add spaces when list pattern is inside parentheses #60475
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • update dependency deployment #60469
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Pause taggers when they are not visible. #60371
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main-vs-deps #60431
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always use text edits in completion for correctness #60466
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix SymbolDisplay.FormatPrimitive #60346
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix binder chain for nameof scopes #60459
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContentRootPath normalization / DataProtection Discriminator #40964
  • Blazor Webassembly always getting ERR_CONNECTION_RESET #40962
  • Make shadow copy a non-experimental feature #40961
    7.0-preview4
  • UsePathBase regex #40959
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40957
  • Add ASP.NET Core Visual Basic project template #40954
  • Coding Standards: naming private variable members #40951
  • HttpLogging middleware should have an option to filter out endpoints #40950
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The type or namespace name 'class' could not be found in visual studio 17.1.2 #40949
  • dotnet watch run crashes when files get modified #40946

Closed

  • Consider removing Mono specific code in SqlServerCache #40345
    Backlog
  • Scaffolding Identity in .Net Core 6 #40938
  • Don't invert the UseProgramMain option in project templates in Visual Studio #40917
    7.0-preview4
  • Referencing incompatible dependency in a Blazor WebAssembly project will result in an unhelpful error #40157
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Host blazor webassembly app with different base path is not working as described in documentation #40205
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor Custom Elements not rendering as/when expected #40318
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor - Model Binding InputText and String #40785
  • Update SpaProxy to work with http-proxy-middleware 2.x. #40875
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40903
  • Program.Main.cs for the worker template should not use Company.WebApplication1 for the namespace #40942

PullRequests

Created

  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • Typo: Update WebApplicationFactoryClientOptions.cs comments #40963
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Dead code? #40956
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Remove Mono specific Code #40920
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • updating date in weatherforcast from 2018 to 2022 #40960
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Increase a few IIS test timeouts #40884
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Update spa-templates to latest commit #40947
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Friendlier exception when invoking JS from outside a WebView context #40943
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Enable trimming on various abstractions projects #40948
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Fix Kestrel conn close on shutdown while response is writing #40933
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add RouteHandlerContext as parameter to IRouteHandlerFilter.InvokeAsync #40919
    area-runtime
  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    blocked, area-mvc, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
    area-infrastructure
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent Geometry with IDrawable on Windows #5691
  • Look at wiring ShellContent Pages into the life cycle of container registration #5686
    .NET 7
  • File nesting with razor components and CSS files does not work in MAUI solution #5685
  • FontManager tests using method unavailable in Android API 21 #5684
  • [Enhancement] Shell TItleBar(?) text with tabbed and non tabbed content #5683
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor of ContentPage not being updated on AppThemeBinding update #5681
  • .NET MAUI ignores all platforms except Windows #5679
  • System.TypeLoadException - Third Party Controls #5678
  • Problem with English spelling of GREY in .NET MAUI TableView #5677
  • Generated splash screen does not retain aspect ratio #5676
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly #5669
    6.0.300
  • [Shell] Allow for users to display the backbutton and flyout button at the same time #5666
  • CheckBox not visible in Windows 11 OS dark theme #5665
  • ShowWindow with PInvoke #5661
  • Enhance TypeConverter usage and caching #5660
  • Grid Column Layout Is Incorrect #5657

Closed

  • If CollectionView is assigned a new handler the header control won't disconnect from the previous CollectionView #5616
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Label.FormattedText does not support FontAttributes on Android, crashes on Windows #5576
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [WinUI] MainThread.BeginInvokeOnMainThread no longer works if fired before a window has been created #5671
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Font Icons in Shell Tabs not showing #4774
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell.GotoAsync not working #5506
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • SearchBar Text changed Event is not triggered in iOS and MacCatalyst Platform #5326
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Determine non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #4897
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWinFormsApp and BlazorWpfApp throw NullReferenceException when using ExampleJsInterop in .NET 6 Preview 3 #1245
    .NET 7
  • [Bug] Shell Android switching tabs breaks menu item #3070
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • [Bug] [Android] ShellContentPage ContentPage.ToolbarItem not rendering #3593
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WinUI] DoPropertyChanged on a bound FormattedString property throws IMauiContext not found #5350
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell: Navigation within a tab causes an error #5275
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Flyout menu is always accessible irrespective of the Shell settings in the Windows platform #5414
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Set Page-Title in OnAppearing with async call #5419
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Toolbar Icons not Showing on Android via Appshell #5454
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] In a Shell enabled App, after traversing to a page defined with the attached property `Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated"` Flyout menu becomes inaccessible #4744
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] Menus doesn't render in Shell if not part of Shell #5210
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Update arcade dependency for Preview 11 release branch and rebuild / release 6.0.1xx workloads / packs #4319
  • [WebAuthenticator] NullReferenceException on CallbackResult #3760
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] Shell ignores FlyoutBehavior property. #5663
  • Clean removal of previous versions of MAUI when a new one is installed #4344
  • Grid Rows overlap #5165
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Map Control #4233
  • Slow Speed of Visual Studio 2022 Preview Maui File New app and Deployment #4027
  • ListView WinUI Group Header renderers incorrect string for first group header #4166
    6.0.300
  • Add/document MAUI support outside VS #3981
  • Error creating windows app with MAUI #3911
  • DefaultLanguage property #3596
  • VS17.1prv1 - WeatherTwentyOne app error #3414
  • Missing Packages when ".NET MAUI App (Preview)" project is created #3238
  • Workload Repair failed: `dotnet workload repair - MAUI #3235
  • [Bug] IOS Simulators Not Populated on Pair #2970
  • .NET Maui Custom Handlers not working, official docs is wrong? #5659

PullRequests

Created

  • Android reduce singleline usage #5690
  • Revert "[macCatalyst] Fix DateTime and Time pickers on the mac (#5475)" #5689
    do-not-merge
  • Comment out shelltests for now #5688
  • [android] add more methods to the AOT profile #5682
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Use fallbacks for font sizes when getting font from Span on Android #5680
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView public API tracking #5672
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Controls] remove whitelisted Converters #5670
  • Switch shell to using ToolbarHandler #5667
  • [C] remove Font usage from Controls #5664
  • Optimize TypeConversionExtensions.ConvertTo #5655
    area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Optimize BindableProperty #5640
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Update Winforms BlazorWebView Docs #5675
  • Wire up to display after FlyoutPage has Loaded #5668
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Try check the current thread first #5673
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [android] update AOT profiles #5674
    area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix SearchBar TextChanged event not working issue #5462
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add the Windows App SDK to the packs #5647
    platform/windows 🪟, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Optimize Element.OnPropertyChanged #5656
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Clip image to ImageView bounds when using CenterCrop (AspectFill) #5589
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, control-image

Updated

  • In case of width Infinity pass desired size of view #5635
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Modal Size and fix modal touch events #5644
    area/modal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581
    area/controls 🎮
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • Default Editor.VerticalTextAlignment to Start #5648
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Ensure GroupValueChangedMessage is received #5646
    area/controls 🎮
  • [android] remove ColorStateList(int[][],int[]) usage #5654
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Take(0) after .Skip(>0) causes an SqlException on SQL Server #27730
  • Migrations script: wrap queries in `sp_executesql` when using `--idempotent` #27729
  • Multiple non-related dbset counts without filter executes as separate queries #27728

Closed

  • Data Annotation Required on some fields causes exception when reading optional fields containing nulls #27727

PullRequests

Updated

  • Reduce SaveChanges roundtrips #27713

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Core / 5 / 6 Windows Update Packages - Very Large File Size #13497
    backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add arm64 leg to source-build CI #13500
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13499
  • [main] Introduce Source-Build release pipeline #13498

Merged

Updated

  • unset shell variables in single statement #13436
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add the Red Hat test suite as a smoke test for source-build #13418
